items.sentence: Tom thanked Mary for the bottle of wine she gave him.
Tom thinks he knows why Mary decided to become a nun.
Tom told me he thought he was going to die in prison.
Tom told me he was going to be busy all day tomorrow.
Tom spent the afternoon messing around in his garage.
Tom squints his eyes when trying to read small print.
Tom told me that he had bacon and eggs for breakfast.
Tom translated the document from French into English.
Tom usually puts mustard and ketchup on his hot dogs.
What\'s the difference between a religion and a cult?
